name: USB Relay Ctrl Plugin
author: Bill Carriveau
description: Adds USB Relay On/Off/AutoOff command with timed shutdown for CH340 & ICStation relays
longDescription: Provides a reliable FPP command to control USB relay boards (CH340 & ICStation). Supports single channel, all channels, and timed auto-off in minutes. Perfect for fire-safe shutdowns, show effects, and remote props.
